Text: This is the final episode of season 1 and the whole series. I loved the show and think they could have kept going with it...but we have no say...just as I thought Invasion was a kick ass show but then they cancelled that one after the 1st season also, which sucked!

Just wanted to add that, at the moment, I am seeding shows 11,12 & 13 until there are a few more seeders and then I will start seeding all 13 again 24/7. As for now, it appears that there are a couple seeds going for the other 10 episodes so be patient & you will get them all. Enjoy!
